name: Monkey.D.Luffy
text: When Attacking Trash up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 2 or less. Then, place any number of Character cards with a cost of 4 or more from your trash at the bottom of your deck in any order. This Character gains +1000 power during this turn for every 3 cards placed at the bottom of your deck.
